text: Hi, we support ticket sidebar of the helpdesk workspace as one of the locations. Have you tried that?

Thank you, Scott. I am afraid the relevant product team members are not on this workspace. Would you please create an Ideas forum post and ask for community upvotes here and in <#C05R599UA12|ui-extensions>?
Any one who likes this idea can upvote here.  <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/A-HubSpot-User-Should-Be-Able-to-Switch-Their-Main-Team/idi-p/1087025#M201616>
